data.eml:eml: Margelopsis gibbesii (McCrady, 1859) (Cnidaria, Hydrozoa): taxonomic review, and conservation of usage by designation of a lectotype

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Calder, Dale R., Johnson, William S. (2015): Margelopsis gibbesii (McCrady, 1859) (Cnidaria, Hydrozoa): taxonomic review, and conservation of usage by designation of a lectotype. Zootaxa 4052 (2): 215-225, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4052.2.5
